passingTestsSubtitle.description: Subtitle for passing tests with number of passed tests

notApplicableTestsTitle.message: The following tests were not applicable:

badAriaRole_name.message: Elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role

controlsWithoutLabel_name.message: Controls and media elements should have labels

focusableElementNotVisibleAndNotAriaHidd.message: These elements are focusable but either invisible or obscured by another element

imagesWithoutAltText_name.message: Images should have an alt attribute

lowContrastElements_name.message: Text elements should have a reasonable contrast ratio

nonExistentAriaLabelledbyElement_name.message: aria-labelledby attributes should refer to an element which exists in the DOM

unfocusableElementsWithOnClick_name.message: Elements with onclick handlers must be focusable

videoWithoutCaptions_name.message: Video elements should use <track> elements to provide captions

auditResult_Severe.description: Keyword for audit rule severity level Severe (options are Severe, Warning and Info)

auditResult_Warning.description: Keyword for audit rule severity level Warning (options are Severe, Warning and Info)

auditUrl_before.description: Text to insert before the audit result more information URL. Should be short, may be empty. Full English example: 'See [AX_TEXT_01] for more information.' In this case, 'See ' is the 'audit_url_before' value, and ' for more information' is the audit_url_after' value. Note that placeholders can't be used in this case as the three parts are different nodes. For RTL languages, 'before' and 'after' should be reversed.

auditUrl_after.description: Text to insert after the audit result more information URL. Full English example: 'See [AX_TEXT_01] for more information.' In this case, 'See ' is the 'audit_url_before' value, and ' for more information' is the audit_url_after' value. Note that placeholders can't be used in this case as the three parts are different nodes. For RTL languages, 'before' and 'after' should be reversed.

contrastRatio.description: Label for the contrast ratio value in the sidebar

noTextAlternative.description: Warning message shown when the inspected element doesn't have any text alternative (such as label, title etc.)

noText.description: Informative value displayed when there is intentionally no computed text for an element.

videoCaptionTracks.description: Label for the 'Caption tracks' value(s) in the sidebar

videoDescriptionTracks.description: Label for the 'Description tracks' value(s) in the sidebar

videoChapterTracks.description: Label for the 'Chapter tracks' value(s) in the sidebar

noAccessibilityInformation.description: Message shown when there are no accessibility-related properties to show in the sidebar

noElementWithId.description: Message shown in the sidebar when no element exists with the given ID
